abstract: Vivendi backs away from deal to buy 100 percent of Mediaset Premium pay-tv unit from Italian media firm Mediaset, saying it wants to purchase 20 percent of entity with second purchase to follow.

headline.print_headline: Vivendi Revises Offer for Mediaset Unit
headline.main: Vivendi Seeks to Revise Deal for Mediaset’s Pay-TV Arm

snippet: The French giant has proposed buying 20 percent of the pay-TV business and then buying another 15 percent of Mediaset in three years....
lead_paragraph: The French giant has proposed buying 20 percent of the pay-TV business and then buying another 15 percent of Mediaset in three years.
